title: net/http: Get("https://user:password@host/") stopped working
body:
I have a program that does http.Get("https://user:password@host/";). Yes, it's
terrible, but it's over HTTPS so it's not _too_ terrible.

Anyway, it worked fine in Go 1 but no longer does. The server does not receive the basic
auth information (or perhaps receives the wrong information).
